# ui-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute             | Description                                                 | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `accessibleControls` | `accessible-controls` | Specifies the aria-controls attribute for the native button | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `accessibleLabel`    | `accessible-label`    | Specifies the alternative text                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`            | Specifies if the tab is disabled                            | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `identifier`         | `identifier`          | Specifies the native button id                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `selected`           | `selected`            | Specifies if the tab is selected                            | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Events

| Event       | Description                              | Type                |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `tabSelect` | Emmited when the button has been clicked | `CustomEvent<void>` |
